entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Neo Monsters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • 13 GemsÔºö$7.99
  • 6 GemsÔºö$3.99
  • 1 GemÔºö$0.99
  • 48 GemsÔºö$28.99
  • 150 GemsÔºö$79.99
  • 74 GemsÔºö$40.99
  • 28 GemsÔºö$14.99

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? ‚ñ∂Features: ‚óè Build your Monster Collection ‚Ä¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! ‚Ä¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. ‚Ä¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! ‚óè Form a Battle Strategy ‚Ä¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. ‚Ä¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! ‚Ä¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. ‚óè Become the Champion ‚Ä¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! ‚Ä¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. ‚Ä¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle‚Äôs atrocity. ‚óè Take the Battle Online ‚Ä¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! ‚Ä¢ Complete 100+ online missions. ‚Ä¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions? Contact our support: neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net Terms of Service: https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

entry.title: ThreeKingdoms The Last Warlord
entry.summary:
Price: $12.99 ‚Üí $4.99
Heroes Assemble: $3.99 ‚Üí $2.99
Art Upgrade Pack: $3.99 ‚Üí $1.99
Feature DLC: $3.99 ‚Üí $2.99
Dawn of Heroes: $3.99 ‚Üí $2.99
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$12.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$3.99 ~ $12.99]Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

  • Heroes AssembleÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $3.99]
  • Art Upgrade PackÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]
  • Feature DLCÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $3.99]
  • Dawn of HeroesÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $3.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

In-App Purchases

  • Treasures EditorÔºö$0.99
  • Heroes AssembleÔºö$2.99
  • Art Upgrade PackÔºö$1.99
  • Feature DLCÔºö$2.99
  • Dawn of HeroesÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Requirements of The Last Warlord: To ensure the game's normal operation, it is required that iOS version should be higher than iOS Version 16 and use iPhone X or X Plus, iPhone 12 or above, or iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 or any iPad Pro to run the game. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/threekingdomsthelastwarlord Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/577230/discussions/1/ Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord is a turn-based lord-playing strategy game developed by the Chengdu Longyou Studio. The studio created this game world set in the period of the Three Kingdoms mainly based on people's opinions on other games set in that period. The game is very detailed in depicting the differences between various cities and also the abilities and features of the military officers. The game also applies an appealing battle system in which weather, landforms, and many other factors will influence the result of each battle. The game is based on the famous Chinese historical novel by Luo Guanzhong (about A.D. 1330 - 1400). I. Simple and graceful graphics finished by fine-lined drawing The portrait of every character in the game is finished by fine-lined drawing with the same style as the picture-story books "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". All interfaces of the game are designed in a typical Chinese style. II. The governing modes are easy to get started with: There are easy governing modes in the game so that players can manage various affairs easily and spend more time enjoying its other facets. Due to the game's lord-playing mode, players do not need to pay much attention to cities besides their own capital. Instead, they can order prefects to govern other cities and later on give them commands when necessary. III. A rich variety of gameplay and contents Over 1,300 officers are available in the game (including those recorded in historical books and novels). There are up to 30 attributes for officers. Over 300 features of officers are available. Over 500 kinds of verified precious items have been applied to the game world for players of different preferences to choose from. Over 60 cities of different styles and 200 features of cities are available. There are also abundant techs research and development items. Its system of combat units contains three main kinds of combat units and about 20 kinds of special combat units. Ultra abundant official positions. Numerous simulated natural phenomena, incidents and disasters will highly represent the calamitous period of the Three Kingdoms. Travelling around will trigger various incidents. IV. The turn-based battle mode requires careful planning in deploying troops Weather, landforms, and even the height of the battlefield will influence any battles in the game. There's also a siege mechanism with a great gaming environment. There are various siege vehicles for players to storm castles and also defending their own castles. V. Other functions There are also other functions available in the game. Cloud Save Steam Cards The achievement system allows players to collect and show off achievements.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: where I put it
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put it‚Äù! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

„ÄåCard.Note„ÄçÔºöÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥ÈÉΩÂÄºÂæóÁî®ÂøÉËÆ∞ÂΩï ËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æ‰ª•Âç°Áâá‰∏∫‰∏ªË¶ÅËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÁöÑÊûÅÁÆÄËÆ∞‰∫ã App „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂÜôÁöÑÊØè‰∏ÄÊÆµÊñáÂ≠óÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÁîüÊàê‰∏ÄÂº†Âº†Á≤æÁæéÁöÑÂç°Áâá „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôËØó„ÄÅÁü≠Êñá„ÄÅÈöèÊÉ≥Ôºõ ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôÊó•ËÆ∞„ÄÅÊ∏ÖÂçï„ÄÅËßÑÂàí„ÄÅË¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºõ ËøòÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•Áî®ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•Êù•ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™Áû¨Èó¥ÁöÑÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ „ÄåCard.Note„Äç‰πùÂ§ßÁâπÁÇπÔºö 1.ÊûÅÁÆÄËÆæËÆ° Âæ™ÁùÄÊûÅÁÆÄÁöÑËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÁªìÂêàÂõæÊ†áÂèäÊâãÂäøÊìç‰ΩúÔºåËΩªÊùæ‰∏äÊâã„ÄÇ 2.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂç°ÁâáÂåñ ÂÖÖÂàÜËûçÂÖ•‰∫ÜÂç°ÁâáËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÈöèÊÑèÂàáÊç¢Ê®™ÁâàÊàñÁ´ñÁâà‰∏§ÁßçÂç°ÁâáÁ¨îËÆ∞ÊòæÁ§∫Ê†∑Âºè„ÄÇ 3.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÊâãÂäøÂåñ ‰∏ãÊãâÂèØÊñ∞Âª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜç‰∏ãÊãâÂèØ‰øùÂ≠òÁ¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂè≥ÊªëÂèØÂëºÂá∫‰ΩúÂìÅÈõÜÔºåÈïøÊåâÂç°ÁâáÂèØÈ¢ÑËßàÂç°ÁâáÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇ 4.ËØ≠Èü≥ÂΩïÂÖ• ÊâìÂºÄ‰æøÂèØÁõ¥Êé•ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•ÔºåÈöèÊó∂ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÁÅµÂÖâÊòæÁé∞ÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ï„ÄÇ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääÂÆÉÂΩì‰ΩúÊàêiOSÊñáËâ∫Áâà‚ÄúÈó™ÂøµËÉ∂Âõä‚Äù„ÄÇ 5.Ë¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºö ÂèØËÆæÁΩÆÊèêÈÜíÈóπÁßçÔºåÈáçË¶Å‰∫ãÊÉÖÂíåËÆ°Âàí‰∏çÂÜçÈîôÂ§±„ÄÇ 6.Âø´Êç∑È´òÊïà ÊîØÊåÅ3D-TouchÂèäWidgetÂ∞èÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂäüËÉΩÔºåÂèØÁõ¥Êé•Âú®Â∫îÁî®ÂõæÊ†áÊàñWidgetÂø´ÈÄüÊâìÂºÄÂ∫îÁî®ÊàñÁõ¥Êé•ËøõÂÖ•ÂàõÂª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÁïåÈù¢ÔºåËÆ©‰Ω†ÈöèÊó∂È´òÊïàÂú∞ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ 7.ÊñáÈùíÂÆöÂà∂ Á≤æÈÄâ‰∫Ü 10 Ê¨æËÆ∞‰∫ãÂ≠ó‰ΩìÂèä 9 ÁßçÊñáÈùí‰∏ªÈ¢òËâ≤Âç°„ÄÅÂ§öËææ 100 Áßç‰∏çÂêåÈ¢úËâ≤ÁöÑËâ≤Âç°ÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÂÆöÂà∂ÂêÑÁßçÂç°Áâá„ÄÇ 8.iCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠• ÊîØÊåÅiCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠•ÔºåÂ§öÂè∞ËÆæÂ§áÈó¥Êï∞ÊçÆÂèØ‰ªªÊÑèÂêåÊ≠•„ÄÇ 9.Ê∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°Âºè ÂÖ®Â±ÄÈÄÇÈÖçÊ∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°ÂºèÔºåËßÜËßâËàíÈÄÇ‰∏çÂà∫Áúº„ÄÇ ÊÑüË∞¢‰∏ãËΩΩÔºåÁîüÊ¥ªÊÑâÂø´„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊúâÈóÆÈ¢òÊàñÂª∫ËÆÆÔºåËØ∑ËÅîÁ≥ªÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÂæÆÂçöÔºöPoPoemÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÈÇÆÁÆ±Ôºöyande18@126.com

entry.title: UnTrap for YouTube
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • MonthlyÔºö$3.99
  • YearlyÔºö$35.99

Application Description

Transform YouTube website into a clean and productive space. Access 250+ powerful features including AI video summaries, layout customization, content filters, automation, and focus tools. ‚óÜ Enhance Your YouTube Experience - Hide Shorts, comments, related, and suggested videos - Grayscale, blur, or hide thumbnails - Auto-redirect the YouTube homepage to a custom page - Remove notifications, buttons, sidebars, and trending tabs - Auto-enable Theater or Full Screen mode - Hide ad banners and auto-skip video promotions - Block videos, channels, or comments using keywords, channel IDs, or regex ‚óÜ AI Video Summaries - Instant Video Summary: Get a clear overview of any YouTube video in just 5 seconds - Key Insights Extraction: Understand the main points without watching the entire video - Timestamped Navigation: Jump directly to the most important moments - Multilingual Support: Summarize and translate in over 40 languages - Top Comments Overview: Instantly see the most insightful viewer opinions - Enhanced Transcript Generator: Get transcripts that outperform YouTube‚Äôs auto-captions in clarity and accuracy ‚óÜ Productivity Tools - Password-Protected Settings: Keep your preferences secure - Temporary Focus Mode: Block distractions with a single click - Scheduled Focus Sessions: Automate distraction-free time blocks - Opening Delays: Add a pause before accessing YouTube or launching the extension - Custom Hotkeys: Instantly trigger features with keyboard shortcuts ‚óÜ Available On - Safari: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1637438059 - Chrome, Opera, Brave: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/untrap-for-youtube/enboaomnljigfhfjfoalacienlhjlfil - Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/untrap-for-youtube/ - Edge: https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/untrap-for-youtube/ngnefladcohhmmibccafkdbcijjoppdoT ‚óÜ Works with YouTube website on desktop, mobile, and embedded videos. Important: UnTrap is only available as a browser extension and is not compatible with the YouTube app. Terms Of Use: https://untrap.app/tos/

iPhone

entry.title: Be Focused Pro - Focus Timer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$12.99 ‚Üí $7.99 [Free ~ $12.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$7.99

Application Description

Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It‚Äôs a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac ‚Äî everything stays perfectly in sync. Task Management ‚Ä¢ Create and manage tasks ‚Ä¢ Add notes and due dates to tasks ‚Ä¢ Organize tasks with tags and filters ‚Ä¢ Paste task lists from other apps Timer Control ‚Ä¢ Start, pause, or skip intervals ‚Ä¢ Auto-start the next interval (optionally) ‚Ä¢ Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy ‚Ä¢ Manage completed intervals Timer Customization ‚Ä¢ Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks ‚Ä¢ Define number of intervals before a long break ‚Ä¢ Set a daily goal for completed intervals ‚Ä¢ Assign different timer settings to individual tasks Reports ‚Ä¢ View detailed reports to monitor your progress ‚Ä¢ Export your data in CSV format Sounds and Notifications ‚Ä¢ Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency ‚Ä¢ Variety of alarm sounds ‚Ä¢ Interactive notifications ‚Ä¢ Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer Integration ‚Ä¢ Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) * ‚Ä¢ Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle ** ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow Quick Access ‚Ä¢ Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen ‚Ä¢ Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island ‚Ä¢ Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button Automation ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app) ‚Ä¢ Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app Device Support ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Also available for Mac ‚Ä¢ Dark and Light mode support * Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately. ** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

entry.title: Skul: The Hero Slayer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $5.99 [$2.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$5.99

Application Description

Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. Featuring 100 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging. The Demon King's Castle in Ruins The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before. What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'. Dark Mirror Mode Once you're through with the main story, test your skills and limits in the new challenging 'Dark Mirror' mode! FEATURES -You‚Äôre the last hope of the entire demon race! Play as Skul, a tiny skeleton on a path to slay the pompous heroes and save the demon king from the corrupt army of Carleon. -Losing your head never felt so right: try on new skulls to borrow the powers and dashing outfits of their previous owners and create synergies with unique items to defeat your enemies. -What is dead may never die: you will not rest until you have faced all the challenges of this action-packed rogue-lite platformer. -Let your hollow eyes feast upon vibrant, cartoony pixel-art 2D animations as you help all sorts of demonic creatures return to their original state. -From the Mummies of Egypt to the Minotaur of Greece or even an official Dead Cells crossover‚Ä¶ Will you spot all the fun easter eggs scattered across the game? CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface ‚Äì exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control - Game Center achievements - Cloud Save ‚Äì Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFi controllers - iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Videdit - Handy Video Editor
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • CropÔºö$0.00
  • SpliceÔºö$0.00
  • MagnifierÔºö$0.00
  • DistortionÔºö$0.00
  • PaintÔºö$0.00
  • RotateÔºö$0.00
  • StickerÔºö$0.00
  • RateÔºö$0.00
  • ChromakeyÔºö$0.00
  • InfoÔºö$0.00

Application Description

Videdit has more than 30 features: Info, Trim, Crop, Blend, Erase, Chromakey, Mosaic, Splice, Particle, BlingBling, Filter, Text, Sticker, Paint, Tuner, Dub, Speed, Reverse, Zoom, Rotate, Compress, Gif, Collage, Magnifier, Distortion, Reflection ... With Videdit, you can edit your videos in a lot of ways and make them more awesome and different. === SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE === Choose the video from Photo, Select a way of editing, handle it and save or share it. === RICH FEATURES === + View, modify or delete some EXIF and properties of the video file + Trim unwanted parts of the video + Crop the video into any size + Splice videos and images with 100+ transition animation effects + Mosaic a part of the video statically or dynamically: select the shape and type, adjust the blur intensity and speed of moving, drag the handler and move to blur the selected part of the video; can invert the blurred area + Add some text into the video with rich text effects + Adjust the color and effect of the video with dozens of filters + Take a picture from the video + Tuner by which to adjust the pitch and volume of the sound within the video, distort the sound, and add reverb to the sound make the sound have some special effects + Dub for the video and support to adjust the volume + Add special audios into the video with over 200 sound effects + Adjust the playback speed of the video + Replay a selected segment of the video and flexibly set count of loop and the the speed of playing + Let the video playback in reverse order + Zoom in or out the video + Rotate or flip the video and support 3D rotation at any angle + Compress the video by resolution, bit rate and frame rate + Convert the video into GIF + Create a picture-in-picture video + Add borders to video with rich border material + Add static or dynamic stickers to videos and can adjust the size, position, duration, speed, color and so on; can flip it; can choose an image as a static sticker or GIF as a dynamic sticker + Support collage of videos with rich background textures + Paint on the video: select color and width of brush, draw, undo, redo, erase + BlingBling for the video and make them full of brilliance: automatically detect highlights, add spot and star streaks and flexibly adjust their quantity, rotating speed and strength + Add particle effects for the videos: over 100 particle effects templates and rich particle texture images, flexible adjustment of various parameters of particle emission. Use your imagination to add surprises to your videos. + Add magnifier for video: flexibility to select the area to be enlarged and adjust the magnification and display position of the magnifier + Distort video: provide a variety of distortion types and flexibly adjust twist radius, force and center position + Reflect video: provide a variety of reflection filters and flexibly adjust the boundary and center position of reflection + Blend videos: provide 20+ classic blend modes: darken, multiply, color burn, linear burn, lighten, color dodge, linear dodge, overlay, soft light, hard light, average, difference, exclusion and so on; flexibly adjust the opacity, size and position of the foreground; exchange the foreground and the background; make the blended area into a variety of shapes + Erase video: you can flexibly select the erased area (eg. the watermark) by drawing directly on the video to erase the content on the fixed area, and the effect is better for the erased area with simple background color + Chromakey video: chromakey by which a block of a particular color (often blue or green) in a video image can be replaced by another color ... === QUICK RESPONSE === + Real-time preview + Quickly generated + Support 1080P HD output === SAVE AND SHARE === + May save videos to your camera roll + Easily share videos with friends If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at: mekits@163.com. Thanks for using Videdit.

entry.title: Dead Cells
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$8.99 ‚Üí $5.99 [$4.99 ~ $8.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$5.99

In-App Purchases

  • The Bad SeedÔºö$3.99
  • Fatal FallsÔºö$3.99
  • The Queen and the SeaÔºö$3.99
  • Return to CastlevaniaÔºö$6.99

Application Description

Death is not the end. Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy island‚Ä¶! That is, assuming you‚Äôre able to fight your way past its keepers. Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss. Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat. First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile! Main Features ‚Ä¢ Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath ‚Ä¢ Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemies‚Äô patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say ‚Äúbaguette‚Äù ‚Ä¢ Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. Surely, the ramparts can‚Äôt be as bad as the sewers, right? ‚Ä¢ Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end? *Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near* RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC Time for some vampire slaying ‚Ä¢ New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont, ‚Ä¢ 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts ‚Ä¢ 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you ‚Ä¢ 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night, ‚Ä¢ 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself ‚Ä¢ 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard ‚Ä¢ Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells THE BAD SEED DLC You reap what you sow ‚Ä¢ New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished ‚Ä¢ New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter ‚Ä¢ New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki ‚Ä¢ New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you FATAL FALLS DLC Ready for a leap of faith? ‚Ä¢ 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum ‚Ä¢ 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...? ‚Ä¢ 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir... ‚Ä¢ 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off QUEEN AND THE SEA DLC Take it to the sea! ‚Ä¢ 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet. ‚Ä¢ 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). ‚Ä¢ 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen! This DLC also gives you the usual extras: - A not-so-cute pet. - Loads of new outfits. - New enemies to bash. WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM. Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface ‚Ä¢ Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit ‚Ä¢ Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttons‚Äô position and size to your liking, swipe to dodge‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ MFi external controller support ‚Ä¢ No ads, no F2P mechanics! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $5.99 [$2.99 ~ $8.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$5.99

Application Description

Escape your childhood fears. First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile! ‚Ä®Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears! Help Six escape The Maw ‚Äì a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal. As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover. Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out! Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design. Sneak your way out of the Maw‚Äôs dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. FEATURES - Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure - Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants - Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles - Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface - Game Center achievements - Compatible with MFi controllers If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

entry.content:

All Price Information

In-App Purchases

  • HushaCoin-8Ôºö$64.99
  • HushaCoin-5Ôºö$14.99

  • HushaCoin-6Ôºö$19.99
  • HushaCoin-2Ôºö$1.99
  • HushaCoin-3Ôºö$4.99

Application Description

Husha ‚Äì Your Safe Haven for Emotions Overview: Husha is an emotional support app that blends AI with voice communication to provide a safe and private space for self-expression. Through intelligent emotion recognition and an anonymous community, every voice is gently heard, and every story receives a warm response. Core Features: ‚Ä¢ Emotional Resonance Channel Discover voice posts that match your current mood through intelligent recommendations. Feel the resonance in shared emotions and realize you are never truly alone. ‚Ä¢ Anonymous Voice Treehole A fully anonymous voice-sharing space. No need for carefully chosen words‚Äîjust express your true feelings with your voice and receive warmth and support from the community. ‚Ä¢ Intelligent Listening Companions Multiple AI companions with unique personalities are available 24/7. Whether you need comfort, advice, or simply someone to talk to, there‚Äôs always an AI that understands you. ‚Ä¢ Emotional Call Connection Connect with kind listeners through intelligent matching. Share your feelings in real-time voice calls in a safe environment and receive instant emotional support.
